name: The Dream You Kept Having After Jerry Left
name_original: The Dream You Kept Having After Jerry Left
description: A game made for "My First Game Jam" that takes place in a recurrent dream. You play as a character whose friend Jerry committed suicide, and feels guilty for not saving him. I made this thing in less than 6 hours (didn't give it much thought, really), so don't expect much. It's my first game after all.
